es.jrq.pcc.web.http.json

Class JSONHttpMessageConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.jrq.pcc.web.http.json.JSONHttpMessageConverter

  • @Component
public class JSONHttpMessageConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    As defined in requirements, JSON is the model interface to work with Royalty Manager REST API, so make sure JSON converter is defined and instantiated in the Spring Context. MappingJackson2HttpMessageConverter will be used as JSON to HTTP converter. It will be configured to fail if any of the properties given are unknown to make sure the interface is robust and
    Author:
    JRQ
